ci_support_linux_64_r_base4.4.yaml:
cdt_name:
- conda
channel_sources:
- conda-forge
channel_targets:
- conda-forge main
cran_mirror:
- https://cran.r-project.org
docker_image:
- quay.io/condaforge/linux-anvil-x86_64:alma9
pin_run_as_build:
  r-base:
    min_pin: x.x
    max_pin: x.x
r_base:
- '4.4'
target_platform:
- linux-64

about.summary: Conduct a noncompartmental analysis with industrial strength. Some features are 1) CDISC SDTM terms 2) Automatic or manual slope selection 3) Supporting both 'linear-up linear-down' and 'linear-up log-down' method 4) Interval(partial) AUCs with 'linear' or 'log' interpolation method 5) Produce pdf, rtf, text report files. * Reference: Gabrielsson J, Weiner D. Pharmacokinetic and Pharmacodynamic Data Analysis - Concepts and Applications. 5th ed. 2016. (ISBN:9198299107).

Conduct a noncompartmental analysis with industrial strength. Some features are 1) CDISC SDTM terms 2) Automatic or manual slope selection 3) Supporting both 'linear-up linear-down' and 'linear-up log-down' method 4) Interval(partial) AUCs with 'linear' or 'log' interpolation method 5) Produce pdf, rtf, text report files. * Reference: Gabrielsson J, Weiner D. Pharmacokinetic and Pharmacodynamic Data Analysis - Concepts and Applications. 5th ed. 2016. (ISBN:9198299107).

name: r-ncar
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set version = "0.5.0" %}
{% set posix = 'm2-' if win else '' %}

package:
  name: r-ncar
  version: {{ version|replace("-", "_") }}

source:
  url:
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/ncar_{{ version }}.tar.gz
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/Archive/ncar/ncar_{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: 8f0deadd9e8cae97ebfc6572849a034799a205a10a7ebf696cae095a9701ceb3

build:
  number: 2
  noarch: generic
  rpaths:
    - lib/R/lib/
    - lib/

requirements:
  build:
    - {{ posix }}zip               # [win]
    - cross-r-base {{ r_base }}    # [build_platform != target_platform]
  host:
    - r-base
    - r-noncompart >=0.4.9
    - r-rtf
  run:
    - r-base
    - r-noncompart >=0.4.9
    - r-rtf

test:
  commands:
    - $R -e "library('ncar')"           # [not win]
    - "\"%R%\" -e \"library('ncar')\""  # [win]

about:
  home: https://cran.r-project.org/package=ncar
  license: GPL-3.0-only
  summary: 'Conduct a noncompartmental analysis with industrial strength. Some features are 1) CDISC SDTM terms 2) Automatic or manual slope selection 3) Supporting both ''linear-up linear-down'' and ''linear-up log-down'' method 4) Interval(partial) AUCs with ''linear'' or ''log'' interpolation method 5) Produce pdf, rtf,
    text report files. * Reference: Gabrielsson J, Weiner D. Pharmacokinetic and Pharmacodynamic Data Analysis - Concepts and Applications. 5th ed. 2016. (ISBN:9198299107).'
  license_family: GPL3
  license_file:
    - '{{ environ["PREFIX"] }}/lib/R/share/licenses/GPL-3'

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - conda-forge/r
    - leej3

# Package: ncar
# Version: 0.4.5
# Date: 2022-02-23
# Title: Noncompartmental Analysis for Pharmacokinetic Report
# Description: Conduct a noncompartmental analysis with industrial strength. Some features are 1) CDISC SDTM terms 2) Automatic or manual slope selection 3) Supporting both 'linear-up linear-down' and 'linear-up log-down' method 4) Interval(partial) AUCs with 'linear' or 'log' interpolation method 5) Produce pdf, rtf, text report files. * Reference: Gabrielsson J, Weiner D. Pharmacokinetic and Pharmacodynamic Data Analysis - Concepts and Applications. 5th ed. 2016. (ISBN:9198299107).
# Depends: rtf, NonCompart (>= 0.4.9)
# Author: Kyun-Seop Bae [aut]
# Maintainer: Kyun-Seop Bae <k@acr.kr>
# Copyright: 2016-, Kyun-Seop Bae
# License: GPL-3
# NeedsCompilation: no
# LazyLoad: yes
# Repository: CRAN
# URL: https://cran.r-project.org/package=ncar
# Packaged: 2022-02-23 00:10:26 UTC; Kyun-SeopBae
# Date/Publication: 2022-02-23 00:20:03 UTC
